description: Try our easy to follow Fruit Trifle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fruit Trifle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup caster sugar (save 0.25 cups of sugar for dusting fruit)

recipeInstructions.text: For passionfruit curd, stir the passionfruit pulp, lemon juice, butter and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves.
Whisk eggs and egg yolks in a bowl until combined. Gradually add in the passionfruit mixture, whisking continuously.
Return mixture to saucepan and cook, stirring, over a low heat, for 6–7 minutes or until thickened and the mixture coats the back of a spoon. Set aside to cool.

Halve the mixed fruit and remove stones. Cut fruit into wedges and place into a roasting pan with extra sugar, orange rind and juice. Toss to coat. Bake for 15 minutes or until softened and syrupy. Set aside to cool.
Whip the cream until soft peaks form. Fold into passionfruit curd.
Place 1/3 of the panettone in a 3L (12cup) capacity glass serving bowl. Top with 1/3 curd and 1/3 of the baked fruit. Repeat layering.
